ingredients.content: 60 g fresh ginger, cut in small pieces

preparations.content: Place sugar, limes, ginger and 300 g sparkling water in mixing bowl. Hold measuring cup in place and crush <b>4 sec/speed 8<b>.

Add remaining 700 g sparkling water. Insert simmering basket, hold it in place with spatula and strain lemonade into a large punch bowl or a jug. Add vodka, grapefruit juice and ice cubes, then serve immediately garnished with grapefruit wedges.
